channel.title: Ip banning
channel.description:
can someone tell me exactly how to ip can someone from my server?....
this is what i do...
1) i use ::checkip to get thier ip 2) i type everything it says (ex. ti122110a081-2510.bb.online.no) 3) i type that in the bannedips file
and thats it... but then they still come on anyways as if i didn't ip ban them at all... so am i doing something wrong? or wat?\
plz help me...

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Do this, go to client.java and find…

if(checkbannedips() == 5) {

Then, replace all that code, with…

if(checkbannedips() == 5) { 
  destruct(); 
  returnCode = 4; 
  System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned."); 
  appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned."); 
}

All you need to do now, is…
Go to character files, click their name, copy their “Last Connection”…
Then, go into Data… > Bannedips, and paste their ip in there… IP banned for good…

Hope this helps

Read full topic
